001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.net;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FrameDecoder;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.RawFrame;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.util.Bytes;
008import java.net.InetAddress;
009import java.net.UnknownHostException;
010import java.util.Arrays;
011import java.util.Optional;
012
013/**
014 * Decodes Ethernet frames captured via libpcap into simplified {@link TcpSegment} instances.
015 * <p>Supports IEEE 802.1Q VLAN tags, IPv4, and IPv6. Stateless and thread-safe.</p>
016 *
017 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
018 */
019public final class FrameDecoderLibpcap implements FrameDecoder {
020
021  /**
022   * Creates a frame decoder for libpcap-captured Ethernet frames.
023   *
024   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025   */
026  public FrameDecoderLibpcap() {}
027
028  /**
029   * Decodes a raw Ethernet frame into a TCP segment when possible.
030   *
031   * @param frame captured Ethernet frame; may be {@code null}
032   * @return TCP segment when the frame contains IPv4/IPv6 TCP payload; otherwise empty
033   * @implNote Validates VLAN tags and IPv4/IPv6 headers; other ether types are dropped.
034   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
035   */
036  @Override public Optional<TcpSegment> decode(RawFrame frame) {
037    if (frame == null) return Optional.empty();
038    byte[] pkt = frame.data();
039    int caplen = pkt.length;
040    if (caplen < 14) return Optional.empty();
041
042    int etherType = Bytes.u16be(pkt, 12);
043    int offset = 14;
044
045    // VLAN tags
046    if (etherType == 0x8100 || etherType == 0x88A8) {
047      if (caplen < offset + 4) return Optional.empty();
048      etherType = Bytes.u16be(pkt, offset + 2);
049      offset += 4;
050    }
051
052    if (etherType == 0x0800) {
053      return decodeIpv4(pkt, caplen, offset, frame.timestampMicros());
054    } else if (etherType == 0x86DD) {
055      return decodeIpv6(pkt, caplen, offset, frame.timestampMicros());
056    }
057    return Optional.empty();
058  }
059
060  private Optional<TcpSegment> decodeIpv4(byte[] pkt, int caplen, int offset, long timestampMicros) {
061    if (caplen < offset + 20) return Optional.empty();
062    int vihl = Bytes.u8(pkt, offset);
063    if ((vihl >>> 4) != 4) return Optional.empty();
064    int ihl = (vihl & 0x0F) * 4;
065    if (caplen < offset + ihl) return Optional.empty();
066
067    int proto = Bytes.u8(pkt, offset + 9);
068    if (proto != 6) return Optional.empty();
069
070    int totalLen = Bytes.u16be(pkt, offset + 2);
071    int ipPayload = Math.max(0, Math.min(totalLen - ihl, caplen - offset - ihl));
072
073    String src = ipv4(pkt, offset + 12);
074    String dst = ipv4(pkt, offset + 16);
075
076    offset += ihl;
077    return decodeTcp(pkt, caplen, offset, ipPayload, src, dst, timestampMicros);
078  }
079
080  private Optional<TcpSegment> decodeIpv6(byte[] pkt, int caplen, int offset, long timestampMicros) {
081    if (caplen < offset + 40) return Optional.empty();
082    int nextHdr = Bytes.u8(pkt, offset + 6);
083    if (nextHdr != 6) return Optional.empty();
084
085    int payloadLen = Bytes.u16be(pkt, offset + 4);
086    int ipPayload = Math.max(0, Math.min(payloadLen, caplen - offset - 40));
087
088    String src = ipv6(pkt, offset + 8);
089    String dst = ipv6(pkt, offset + 24);
090
091    offset += 40;
092    return decodeTcp(pkt, caplen, offset, ipPayload, src, dst, timestampMicros);
093  }
094
095  private Optional<TcpSegment> decodeTcp(
096      byte[] pkt,
097      int caplen,
098      int offset,
099      int ipPayload,
100      String src,
101      String dst,
102      long timestampMicros) {
103    if (caplen < offset + 20) return Optional.empty();
104
105    int sport = Bytes.u16be(pkt, offset);
106    int dport = Bytes.u16be(pkt, offset + 2);
107    long seq = Bytes.u32be(pkt, offset + 4) & 0xFFFFFFFFL;
108
109    int dataOff = (Bytes.u8(pkt, offset + 12) >>> 4) * 4;
110    if (dataOff < 20 || caplen < offset + dataOff) return Optional.empty();
111
112    int flags = Bytes.u8(pkt, offset + 13);
113    boolean fin = (flags & 0x01) != 0;
114    boolean syn = (flags & 0x02) != 0;
115    boolean rst = (flags & 0x04) != 0;
116    boolean psh = (flags & 0x08) != 0;
117    boolean ack = (flags & 0x10) != 0;
118
119    int payloadOffset = offset + dataOff;
120    if (payloadOffset > caplen) return Optional.empty();
121
122    int payloadLen = Math.max(0, Math.min(caplen - payloadOffset, ipPayload - dataOff));
123    byte[] payload = new byte[payloadLen];
124    if (payloadLen > 0) {
125      System.arraycopy(pkt, payloadOffset, payload, 0, payloadLen);
126    }
127
128    FiveTuple tuple = new FiveTuple(src, sport, dst, dport, "TCP");
129    TcpSegment segment =
130        new TcpSegment(tuple, seq, true, payload, fin, syn, rst, psh, ack, timestampMicros);
131    return Optional.of(segment);
132  }
133
134  private static String ipv4(byte[] p, int off) {
135    return (Bytes.u8(p, off))
136        + "." + Bytes.u8(p, off + 1)
137        + "." + Bytes.u8(p, off + 2)
138        + "." + Bytes.u8(p, off + 3);
139  }
140
141  private static String ipv6(byte[] p, int off) {
142    try {
143      return InetAddress.getByAddress(Arrays.copyOfRange(p, off, off + 16)).getHostAddress();
144    } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
145      return "::";
146    }
147  }
148}
149
